sources.title: Sagkoshi - Killing Mad Dogs (2001)
sources.description: Synopsis Author Golrokh Kamali returns to Tehran and her husband after spending a year in the provinces. Still angry about her husband's infidelities, Golrokh must come to his defense when a group of unscrupulous businessmen threaten to imprison him for debt. Produced by: Behrouz Hashemian (Iran/France) Screenplay (in Farsi) by: Bahram Beyzaie Production Design by: Iraj Raminfar Photography (Color) by: Asghar Rafie Jam Edited by: Bahram Beyzaie Music by: Vartan Sahakian & Saba Khozoie Cast: Mozhdeh Shamsai .... Golrokh Kamali Majid Mozaffari .... Husband Reza Kianian .... Partner Mitra Hajjar .... Secretary Dariush Arjmand .... Businessman Ahmad Najafi Enayat Bakhshi Esmail Shangale Ferdous Kaviani Jamshid Layegh Hassan Pour Shirazi Festivals (Prizes): Fajr 01: International Competition (Best Actress: Shamsaie) & National Competition (Best Screenplay, Photography, S. Actor: Arjmand, Set Design, Audience Award), Goteborg 02
